PRODUCT_LIST.DESC: Returns all products including vehicles, powerwalls, and energy sites.

VEHICLES.DESC: Returns a list of all vehicle registered for the authenticated user.

VEHICLE_DATA.DESC: All information and states of the vehicle.

CHARGE_STATE.DESC: Charge state information including battery limit, charge miles, charge voltage, charge phases, current, charge management, and battery heater status.

CLIMATE_STATE.DESC: Climate settings including seats, vents battery, steering wheel, and preconditioning state.

DRIVE_STATE.DESC: Drive state including latitude, longitude, and heading of the vehicle.

WAKE_UP.DESC: Wakes up the vehicle from a sleeping state.

REMOTE_START_DRIVE.DESC: Enables keyless driving. There is a two minute window after issuing the command to start driving the car.

DOOR_UNLOCK.DESC: Unlocks the doors to the vehicle.

DOOR_LOCK.DESC: Locks the doors to the vehicle.

SUN_ROOF_CONTROL.DESC: Controls the panoramic sunroof on the Model S.

PARAM.state: The amount to open the sunroof. Currently this only allows the values vent and close.

WINDOW_CONTROL.DESC: Controls the windows. Will vent or close all windows simultaneously.

PARAM.command: What action to take with the windows. Allows the values vent and close. lat and lon values must be near the current location of the car for operation to succeed.
PARAM.lat: Your current latitude. See Notes above.
PARAM.lon: Your current longitude. See Notes above.

ACTUATE_TRUNK.DESC: Opens or close either the front or rear trunk.

PARAM.which_trunk: Which trunk to open/close. rear and front are the only options.

HONK_HORN.DESC: Honks the horn of the vehicle once.

AUTO_CONDITIONING_START.DESC: Start the climate control (HVAC) system. Will cool or heat automatically, depending on set temperature.

SET_PRECONDITIONING_MAX.DESC: Toggles the climate controls between Max Defrost and the previous setting.

PARAM.on: True to turn on, false to turn off.

REMOTE_SEAT_HEATER_REQUEST.DESC: Sets the specified seat's heater level.

PARAM.heater: The desired seat to heat. (Front: left=0, right=1; Rear: left=2, center=4, right=5)
PARAM.level: The desired level for the heater. (0-3)

REMOTE_STEERING_WHEEL_HEATER_REQUEST.DESC: Turn steering wheel heater on or off.

PARAM.on: True to turn on, false to turn off.

SET_TEMPS.DESC: Sets the target temperature for the climate control (HVAC) system. (e.g. value 20)

PARAM.driver_temp: The desired temperature on the driver's side in celsius.
PARAM.passenger_temp: The desired temperature on the passenger's side in celsius.

CHARGE_PORT_DOOR_OPEN.DESC: Opens the charge port or unlocks the cable.

CHARGE_START.DESC: If the car is plugged in but not currently charging, this will start it charging.

CHARGE_STOP.DESC: If the car is currently charging, this will stop it.

CHARGE_STANDARD.DESC: Set vehicle to standard charge limit or ~90%.

CHARGE_MAX_RANGE.DESC: Set the vehicle to max charge limit.

SET_CHARGE_LIMIT.DESC: Set the vehicle to defined charge limit. (e.g. value 80)

PARAM.percent: The percentage the battery will charge until.

SET_CHARGING_AMPS.DESC: Sets the charge amps limit to a custom value. (e.g. value 16)

PARAM.charging_amps: The max amps to use during charging.

PARAM.enable: true for on, false for off.
PARAM.departure_time: time in minutes since midnight local time.
PARAM.preconditioning_enabled: true for on, false for off.
PARAM.preconditioning_weekdays_only: true for on, false for off.
PARAM.off_peak_charging_enabled: true for on, false for off.
PARAM.off_peak_charging_weekdays_only: true for on, false for off.
PARAM.end_off_peak_time: time in minutes since midnight local time.

PARAM.enable: true for on, false for off.
PARAM.time: time in minutes since midnight local time.

PARAM.on: True to turn on, false to turn off.
PARAM.password: A PIN to deactivate Valet Mode (e.g. 1234).

RESET_VALET_PIN.DESC: Clears the currently set PIN for Valet Mode when deactivated. A new PIN will be required when activating from the car screen.

SET_SENTRY_MODE.DESC: Turns sentry mode on or off.

PARAM.on: True to turn on, false to turn off.

LIVE_STATUS.DESC:
Only for energy products!
Retrieves current system information (e.g. solar production, grid export/import, home consumption, etc.).

SITE_INFO.DESC:
Only for energy products!
Retrieves general system information.
